title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Fortifying encryption in transit: speed, security and AWS Nitro Power (NET313)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加强传输中加密：速度、安全性和 AWS Nitro 强力支持 (NET313)
abstract: Secure data in transit across AWS without compromising performance or agility. This session covers practical encryption implementation using AWS Nitro built-in protection, TLS encryption, SSH hardening, IPSec with AWS Site-to-Site VPN, and MACSec on AWS Direct Connect. Learn proven techniques for layering these methods while maintaining optimal performance. Through real-world configurations and implementation approaches, participants will explore current best practices and emerging post-quantum encryption standards. By session’s end, take away actionable implementation guides for establishing fortified transit encryption.
abstract_cn: 在不影响性能或敏捷性的情况下保护AWS中的传输数据安全。本课程涵盖使用AWS Nitro内置保护、TLS加密、SSH加固、带有AWS站点到站点VPN的IPSec以及AWS Direct Connect上的MACSec的实用加密实施。学习在保持最佳性能的同时分层使用这些方法的成熟技术。通过真实世界的配置和实施方法，参与者将探索当前最佳实践和新兴的后量子加密标准。课程结束时，获得建立强化传输加密的可操作实施指南。
